attributes.additional_details:
My name is Andrew and I am an ex serviceman.  I care passionately about the MOD and what it aims to achieve for the serviceman, UK defence policy and the international agenda of our Queen and Government.

I would like someone in the defence secretary role who has served their country and understands what the Officers, non commissioned officers and junior ranks face in our modern day forces.

I would like to put myself forward to be an apprentice of the Defence secretary and eventually lead the UK forces into a challenging future with out losing focus on what the serviceman needs to carry out efficient, effective national and international operations.
